Key Match Events: Tanner Bibee pitched 6.0 innings, gave up two hits, allowed one earned run, struck out six hitters, and walked three batters.
Kyle Manzardo went 3-for-4 on Tuesday against the Royals, including another extra-base hit.
Brayan Rocchio hit a two-run homer in the top of the seventh inning, giving the Guardians a three-run lead.
Others: This was a big win for the Guardians, and they never would've been able to win without Rocchio's impact.
